name: Endless Spaceship
description:
Endless Spaceship is an action roguelike where you'll defend yourself against countless obstacles and enemies with a spaceship. Every 30 seconds you choose a new upgrade on your spaceship and try to reach the top of the world ranking.



You start clean every game, but if you choose the right combinations, you can reach insane scores like this:



The higher your score, the more enemies and obstacles!
